supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-18 (in mm), (1) 35 x 82, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (2) 52 x 32, (A) 5 lines, right margin, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (3) 45 x 28, (A) 6 lines, right margin (?), (B) traces of 6 lines, no margins, (4) 26 x 27, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (5) 31 x 28, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (6) 41 x 18, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) 2 lines, top margin, (7) 41 x 63, (A) 2 lines, left bottom margins, (B) blank, (8) 28 x 31, (A) 3 lines, left margin, (B) 1 line, no margins (?), (9) 24 x 24, (A) 2 lines, right bottom margins, (B) 3 lines, no margins, (10) 23 x 24, (A) 3 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (11) 28 x 24, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (12) 37 x 16, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (13) 46 x 55, (A) 2 col., col. i: 3 lines, right margin, col. ii: 1 line, left margin, (B) blank, (14) 49 x 14, (A) 2 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (15) 59 x 31, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) 5 lines, no margins, (16) 73 x 36, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (17) 61 x 35, (A) 2 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (18) 87 x 35, (A) 5 lines, right margin, (B) traces
